txt.en: The Courtyard has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The haunted alley is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gruglup has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the haunted alley</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Auction Hall</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the South Gate</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Padfoot has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Jailhouse</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Goretusk has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'There is more to do. The world is besieged by evil, but for tonight, we may celebrate a great victory!'
The haunted alley has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The South-gate is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have reclaimed the South-gate of Bree.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You  have reclaimed the Auction Hall</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Sounds of snorting come from the north-east</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have reclaimed the haunted alley.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have reclaimed the Jailhouse.</rgb>
The Town Hall has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>You have reclaimed the courtyard</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have reclaimed Town Hall and freed the south of Bree.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A door slams loudly, 'So you want a fight?'</rgb>
While the Rangers of the North were distracted in the South, brigands and ruffians took an opportunity to wrest control of Bree....
'You did it! The south of Bree is free once more! Thank you.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ned Ashleaf has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A door slams behind you, 'I am free of my shackles and prison!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A door to the west is flung open, 'The age of man is over!'</rgb>
'Looks like some more meat for the slaughter!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A raspy voice sounds from the north-west, 'Where is it? Where did it go?'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Crashing of plates and a faint chewing come from the north</rgb>
Claim the South-gate
Claim the Auction Hall
Claim the haunted alley
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Tom Greythistle has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Claim the Jailhouse
'Bree belongs to us now.'
Claim the courtyard
'No, please, no....'
Claim the Town Hall
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Auction Hall is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
'Ah, good, the reinforcements have arrived. It is good to see the Free Peoples rising up to support Bree.'
'I wish I could help, I stormed the gate thirty minutes ago and got this wound for my trouble.'
'The enemy is greatly entrenched. Their defences extend from the South-gate back to the Town Hall.'
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the South-gate</rgb>
'It is up to you now. Reclaim Bree for the Free Peoples!'
The first step to driving the brigands out of Bree is to reclaim the South-gate and gain access to the city itself.
South-gate
With the South-gate claimed, you can move on to the southern courtyard and the Auction House, a crucial hub of commerce.
Auction Hall
The way north has been blocked and barricaded by giant snow mounds, you will have to head west through the haunted alley.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: TÃºkar has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Haunted Alley
Claiming the Jailhouse will provide a convenient place to lockup those that remain once the city is back under the control of the Free Peoples.
Jailhouse
Courtyard
Without control of the courtyard, you cannot hope to assault and claim Town Hall.
The Control Point has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
Town Hall
All that remains is to claim Town Hall and see the banner of Bree-town fly high over it.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: You hear a soft growling to the east</rgb>
The Jailhouse has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. It is safe to press on</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Jailhouse is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
